advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
What are you up to tonight? Download YPlan now to discover and book the best events around town from our expertly curated shortlist.

AVAILABLE IN NEW YORK, SAN FRANCISCO, LAS VEGAS, LONDON AND EDINBURGH, WITH MORE CITIES COMING SOON.

Ashton Kutcher says: "YPlan - a curated list of cool events that you can book in seconds. It's the mobile answer to the 'what am I doing tonight?' question."

YPlan is tonight’s going out app. Browse through a curated shortlist of the best events every night and book in just two taps. No need to print anything, we’re 100% mobile.

Brought to you by a team of entertainment experts, we’re on a mission to make your nights out more spontaneous because, let’s be honest, the best ones always are. 

Why YPlan?
● Get inspired by our curated list of events every night.
● Book in two taps and go. Easy peasy.
● Discover special perks and unique discounts. 
● Store your tickets in Passbook. 
● Invite pals and earn $10 each time a new friend buys.

Just to give you a taster, we’ve lined up the likes of AEG Live, New York Yankees, Apple Retail In-Store, Sofar Sounds, Lincoln Center, New Victory Theatre, and Brooklyn Bowl just to name a few.

So why plan when you have YPlan? 

************************************************************

But hey don’t just take our word for it. We’ve gotten kudos from the likes of Wall Street Journal, Mashable, and Business Insider (not to mention all our wonderful YPlanners).

"YPlan offers a concise list of the best NYC nightlife in one app... genius." - Pharrell Williams

“YPlan has a highly-curated list of select last-minute events for you.” - Wall Street Journal

“20 Hot London Startups You Need To Watch” - Mashable

#1 on “13 Hot London Startups You Need To Watch” - Business Insider

“A real contender to Time Out.” - Eva S.

************************************************************

First New York, San Francisco, Las Vegas, London and Edinburgh then the world! 

We’re live and kicking in New York, San Francisco, Las Vegas, London and Edinburgh but we’re looking to spread our wings over time. If you really want YPlan to come to your city, drop us a line here: hello@yplanapp.com

************************************************************

We’d love to hear your feedback. Please send us your ideas for improving YPlan by popping an email to hello@yplanapp.com and we’ll get back to you in a flash. Unfortunately, we can’t respond to your comments here on the App Store.
trackCensoredName: YPlan – New York, San Francisco, Las Vegas, London + Edinburgh's event discovery app
trackName: YPlan – New York, San Francisco, Las Vegas, London + Edinburgh's event discovery app
